Hi,

I'll try to help you with your concerns:

1) I believe you could find useful information and examples which will help you understand the use of the MVVM pattern in the following chapters of the Prism documentation:

  • Chapter 5: Implementing the MVVM Pattern
  • Chapter 6: Advanced MVVM Scenarios

There you can find, that there are various techniques for wiring up a view to a view model, particularly you could find specific information and examples about this in the Construction and Wire-Up and Advanced Construction and Wire-Up sections of the aforementioned chapters.

Also, for additional information and examples regarding the MVVM pattern, I recommend you to check the Karl Shifflett's In the Box training kit  which is a high quality, multi-media training that is consumed within Visual Studio 2010.
